text.p: These are the leading stories in the Tunisian press on Tuesday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.

- President says it was necessary to intervene quickly to persuade Israel to renounce provocative acts and to implement all concluded agreements which constitute the fundamentals of the peace process.
- President orders granting of advantageous loans for owners of old buildings to repair them.
- President says Israel must renounce provocative acts.
